entry.tran: 静力锻炼法;等长收缩肌肉锻炼法
entry.def: Isometrics or isometric exercises are exercises in which you make your muscles work against each other or against something else, for example by pressing your hands together.

means.word_mean: 1. muscle-building exercises (or a system of muscle-building exercises) involving muscular contractions against resistance without movement (the muscles contracts but the length of the muscle does not change)
